# Frame Play
<!--
@name: Frame Play
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Play IFF frameson screen
## Parameters

- **bank**: The number of a memory bank or it's addres
- **number**: The number of frames to play
- _screen_ (optional): The index of the screen to play to, or the current screen if not specified
---
